title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat the eggs with grated Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain the spaghetti and mix quickly with the pancetta.
Remove from heat, add the egg mixture, and toss quickly.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spice mix for 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Heat tomato puree and spices in a pan.
Add grilled chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cook until thickened.
